string.name: name
string.value: The Storybook on Hongbu and Nolbu (Nolbu)
I'm sure I received the storybook after teaching Nolbu a lesson. Where did it go? Should I go see Nolbu again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031235##k. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it the last time I taught Nolbu a lesson, but I can't seem to find it. When I went to visit Nolbu and ask for the storybook, Nolbu went on a tirade and decided to give me the storybook only after giving him #b2 #t4000100#s#k.\n\n#t4000100# #b#c4000100##k/2
I gave Nolbu 2 #t4000100#s just as he requested to reacquire #t4031235#.

You ... you ... it's you!!! What are you doing here! Get out of here! I don't want to see you! I still can't believe I lost all that gold and jewelry because of a scumbag like you!!!\r\n#L0# #bEasy, easy. I came here because I lost the storybook that you gave me last time. Do you have an extra copy by chance?#k

What if I DO have it? I will NEVER, EVER give it to a scumbag like you, so don't get your hopes up and leave immediately!\r\n#L0# #bI'm not here to ask you to give it to me for free. I'll get you something you want in return.#k
Really? Okay! No turning back, now! Understand?

I heard this story a few days ago from a stranger that visited this town. Apparently, there's an octopus-looking monster at Eos Tower, and it drops a shiny, glittering #bcrown#k when killed. If you give me that crown, then I'll give you the storybook. I'll need 1... no, #b2#k of those! Understand?
Forget it! I can't trust you either! You're the one losing out on this!

Did you bring it? Huh? Give it to me! (snatch) I don't know what you need this old, ragged for, but take it. Muahahaha, I'm going to be rich! This crown will definitely make me become rich again! Muahahahah!
Hey, what's this? This is a toy crown!!! Not a real one, but a fake one! Oh my goodness ... I'm ruined!!!!
Did you bring that shiny, glittering #bcrown#k with you? I need 2, #b2!!!!#k Understand? Then bring it, if you really need this storybook.
